findings: Successfully converted a complex multi-path real estate survey with 3 distinct branches (buy/rent/sell)
All 25 nodes preserved: 1 start, 23 questions, 1 end node
All conditional branching logic accurately preserved:
- Primary intent branching: buy/rent/sell paths from q4-intent
- Property type branching: house/land vs apartment/condo in both buy and rent paths
- Using ?= operator for equals conditions (buy, rent, sell, house, land)
- Using ?in operator for 'in' conditions (apartment/condo arrays)
All 3 convergence points successfully handled:
- Buy path merges at q8-buy-bedrooms from house/land and apartment/condo branches
- Rent path merges at q8-rent-bedrooms from house/land and apartment/condo branches
- All 3 paths (buy/rent/sell) converge at q-timeframe
Question type mapping verified:
- Tx* (text, required): q1-name
- Em* (email, required): q2-email with strict validation
- Ph* (phone, required): q3-phone with US country code
- Ch* (choice, required): q4-intent, q6-buy-property-type, q6-rent-property-type, q5-sell-property-type
- Cu* (currency, required): q5-buy-budget, q5-rent-budget, q6-sell-price with USD config
- Dm* (dimensions, required): q7-buy-lot-size, q7-rent-lot-size, q7-sell-property-size with 2d sq ft config
- Nu* (number, required): q8-buy-bedrooms, q8-rent-bedrooms, q8-sell-year-built with min/max constraints
- Mc (multiChoice, optional): q9-buy-features (8 options), q9-rent-features (10 options)
- Gl* (geolocation, required): q10-buy-location, q10-rent-location, q9-sell-location with SF default and search enabled
- Dr* (dateRange, required): q-timeframe with 2-month display and dynamic minDate
- Tx (text, optional): q-additional for comments
All configuration properties preserved in {config} blocks
Choice and multiChoice options preserved in [key=value] format
Descriptions preserved as second quoted string parameter where present
Start node converted to ! (message) node with title and message
End node converted to < (end) node with title and message
Complex geolocation config including lat/lng coordinates, zoom, height, search, user location preserved
Currency position, placeholders, and validation rules preserved
Dimension units (sq ft) and type (2d) preserved across all dimension questions
Number constraints (min, max, step, unit) preserved for bedroom and year questions
Email validation strictness preserved
Phone country code preserved
DateRange configuration including numberOfMonths and placeholders preserved
53.3% reduction in character count (12,903 â†’ 6,023 chars)
DSL maintains readability with clear path separation via comments
Multi-line formatting for questions with multiple conditional branches improves clarity
All 9 conditional branches accurately represented with proper operators
